blogs.title: Getting Started with Node.js
blogs.author: Alex Johnson
blogs.mainText: Kickstart your backend journey by exploring Node.js fundamentals and why it’s a must-have tool for modern developers.

content.text: Node.js is a powerful JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine. It allows developers to build scalable network applications.

blogs.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox: Which One to Use?
blogs.author: Emily Clark
blogs.mainText: Confused about CSS layouts? Let’s break down Grid vs Flexbox and help you decide the perfect tool for your next design.

content.text: CSS Grid and Flexbox are both popular layout models, but they have different use cases.

items: Aligns items into rows and columns
Simplifies alignment of items in a row or column

blogs.title: Boost Your Productivity as a Developer
blogs.author: Michael Lee
blogs.mainText: Want to code faster and smarter? Check out practical productivity hacks tailored for developers like you.

content.text: Code snippets can help you speed up your workflow by reducing repetitive tasks.
